Digital Transformation (DX) Guides

The PTC Education Advanced Technologies team collects and produces guides and exercises to help students understand how to mix PTC solutions together and with other I4.0 and Smart Manufacturing technologies. A selection of guides that introduce these solutions are included below.
Topic Preview
PTC API Playground
Simple IoT with Airtable
Spatial Toolbox on Raspberry Pi with Wifi Hotspot
Spatial Toolbox and Kepware
Getting Started with Spatial Toolbox on Arduino
How to Add a World Object in Vuforia Spatial Toolbox
Storing images taken in the Vuforia View app in a ThingWorx data table
Hello ThingWorx! A simple Hello World ThingWorx example that shows how to connect to remote data with REST API to make a simple IoT temperature dashboard. ThingWorx and Vuforia Studio both require knowledge of JavaScript -- Learn JS at W3Schools.com
Vuforia Studio and ThingWorx
Universal Robot Augmented Reality Digital Twin, built with Vuforia Studio and ThingWorx, using federated local and cloud-based instances enabling both high-performance and remote data access. More details on Federating instances in this PDF.
